item.title: Calling MS Graph from PSU on Azure
item.description: The Microsoft.Graph PowerShell module wraps up all the Graph endpoints in PowerShell functions, but for security reasons, the Connect-MgGraph function doesn’t allow for stored (secret) credentials. However, since we host PowerShell Universal as an Azure App Service, and we have a managed identity for that app service, we can connect to Graph as the app!

item.title: PowerShell Universal On-Startup Script
item.description: I’ve been playing with PowerShell Universal for almost a year now, and I thought this would be a great place to share some tips, tricks and scripts that have helped me out. And what better place to start than the On-Startup.ps1 script? That’s the script that I have configured to run when our PSU server starts.
